parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The requested page of the result. Defaults to 1 if not supplied.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The size of a page. Defaults to 50 if not supplied.

parameters.name: keepExisting
parameters.description: If the keepExisting parameter is set to false, the not referenced objects will be deleted

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. Supported properties are name,search.

parameters.name: groupByEntities
parameters.description: 'true' if user activities should only return the latest grouped by given search properties. Defaults to 'false'.

parameters.name: page
parameters.description: The requested page of the result. Defaults to 1 if not supplied.

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: The size of a page. Defaults to 50 if not supplied.

parameters.name: query
parameters.description: Search query. Supported properties are activityType,entityType,entity.
